+@name: One Night I Threatened My Stalker and Made Him My Boyfriend

info.+content: One Night I Threatened My Stalker and Made Him My Boyfriend
Aru Yoru, Stalker o Kyōhaku Shite Kareshi ni Shimashita.
ある夜、ストーカーを脅迫して彼氏にしました。

Mayuri, age twenty-six, is a sales worker at one of the leading companies in Japan. She seems perfect--but she is troubled by a dark shadow lurking around her at night. She knows a stalker follows her and has moved many times to get rid of him. But she can't. One night, she sees a suspicious man fumbling in her trash. He's Ryo Kuroki, Mayuri's high school classmate. Now that she knows who her stalker is, she comes up with a revenge plan.
